reviewText: I don't feel that the producer of this was very serious about his or their work, It is a half assed attempt to con us out of money..Save you money buy ammo..........
summary: Just a Recording made for money
Title: American Experience: New Orleans

reviewText: If you haven't seen FAUBOURG TREMÉ, then this is definitely the documentary to buy if New Orleans interests you, or like me, you've just awoken to its special charm via the TV series TREM.It is a very well detailed account of the city's history, almost from Big Bang until today, and is very much more extensive than that other fine documentary, FAUBOURG TREMÉ, which deals more with the neighbourhood of the same name from which the TV series takes its cue.All the better known aspects of N.O. are covered, so that you are not left in any doubt as to why music, particularly jazz, refined cuisine and the art of living in general took such firm hold here. It must have been a truly amazing place during the last century and a half, and although much was lost in the devastation caused by Katrina, and the general effect of modern day utilitarianism, some of its magic still appears to live on.As I haven't been there, this documentary will have to stand as a good substitute for the real thing. Meanwhile,roll on HBO's TREMÉ.
Title: American Experience: New Orleans

reviewText: This is one of the best New Orleans documentary I've ever seen and I've seen many.  This one captured the essence of the place and made me really want to go there.  In fact, while watching it, I felt as if I were already there.  If you're interested in checking out some Documentaries of New Orleans I would highly recommend you ad this to your list.
Title: American Experience: New Orleans

reviewText: Great DVD about the History of New Orleans. Very accurate. I would recommend this if you love New Orleans as much as I do!
summary: American Experience is a wonderful dvd on the History of New Orleans! Love that city!
Title: American Experience: New Orleans

reviewText: Yes this was a VERY well done documentary. However, I was expecting more about the early years. Like the Battle of New Orleans and the city's part during the Civil War. But, in all fairness, this was a two hour program and it's difficult to cover the history of a city so rich in culture and history in that amount of time.  So 4 stars for being a great program and one star off because of what I would have preferred in the story.
Title: American Experience: New Orleans

reviewText: Although a little somber in places the dvd is an excellent depiction of New Orleans history. Would have loved to heard and seen more great music. All in all, a fine piece of reporting.
summary: What musician doesn't love New Orleans!
Title: American Experience: New Orleans

reviewText: Liked it a lot, especially the parts on the 1927 flood and blowing up the levees.Hard to believe-- 36 tons of dynamite to do something that was patently stupid?I guess that's what happens with politics.Liked the program despite the occasional anti-white bias.
summary: Liked the program despite the occasional anti-white bias.
Title: American Experience: New Orleans
